tags.name: Provider Items
tags.description: File and folder operations on storage providers

get.description: List QA jobs for current user
Returns a paginated list of files and folders in the specified path

post.description: Creates a new folder in the provider
Returns a presigned URL for direct upload to storage (for large files)
Confirms that a file was uploaded via presigned URL
Creates an EliseFile from an existing provider item and triggers indexation

400.description: Invalid request or unsupported file extension

post.description: Forces reindexation of a file. Optionally reparses the document.
Forces recomputation of ontologies and metadata for a file

get.description: List extraction jobs for current user
Returns a paginated list of collections the caller has access to

post.description: Creates a new collection owned by the current user

get.description: Returns a paginated list of files belonging to the collection

post.description: Associates an existing file with the collection

get.description: Returns a single collection by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a collection. Only the owner can delete a collection.

403.description: Access denied - only owner can delete

patch.description: Partially updates a collection. Only provided fields will be updated.

get.description: Get QA job by ID
Get QA job results
Get QA job inputs
Get QA job annotations
Returns a paginated list of storage providers the caller has access to. Secret fields are redacted.
Returns a URL to download the file
Returns the raw file content (proxy for providers without presigned URLs)
Returns a single storage provider by its ID. Secret fields are redacted.
Returns a file by its ID
Returns computed ontologies for a file
Get extraction job by ID
Get extraction job results
Get extraction job inputs
Get extraction job annotations

delete.description: Removes the association between a file and the collection

enumValues.description: List of possible values for enum types

enumColors.description: Map of enum values to their associated colors

size.description: File size in bytes (null for folders)

CreateItemRequest.description: Create folder request (for JSON body). For file upload, use multipart form.

url.description: Presigned URL for direct upload (null if not supported)

expiresInSeconds.description: Time in seconds until the URL expires

supported.description: Whether presigned upload is supported by this provider

path.description: Directory path where file was uploaded

CreateFileRequest.description: Request to create EliseFile from provider item

AddFileToCollectionRequest.description: Request to add a file to a collection

fileId.description: EliseFile ID to add to the collection

ItemReference.description: Reference to an item for delete operations

nextCursor.description: Cursor for next page, null if no more pages

expiresInSeconds.description: Time in seconds until the URL expires
